text: Ŵajinji mwa achinsyene itabu (Ayuda ni Akilisito) aŵele ali nkusachilila yanti ali am'buchisye (Asilamummwe) ku ukafili panyuma pakulupilila kwenu, ligongo lya litima lyakutyochela kwa ŵanganyao achimisyene, panyuma pakuonechela kwa jamanjao chakuona (jwali Muhammadi ﷺ), basi mwakululuchilani nikwaleka mpaka Allah ayichenalyo lilamusi Lyakwe, chisimu Allah pa chindu chilichose aŵele Jwakombola
